alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Lynn Canal (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 07 at 12:47PM AKST until February 08 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Haines Highway. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest snowfall expected beyond 25 mile Monday evening, then changing to rain Tuesday. Near sea level, snow will change to rain through the evening with minor accumulations.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
